text:
ところで
ユニティ
ユニコーン
もう見た?
style: font-size: 14px;color: #87121E;background-color: #FF8B9E;left: 10px;top: 10px;width: 113px;height: 75px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

text:
うん!!
友達の半分は
それ着てるわよ!
style: font-size: 14px;color: #753301;background-color: #FFFAA8;left: 130px;top: 45px;width: 129px;height: 97px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

font-size: 14px;color: #87121E;background-color: #FF8B9E;left: 285px;top: 65px;width: 49px;height: 63px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

text:
私達はすごく
繋がってるのよ
style: font-size: 14px;color: #753301;background-color: #FFFAA8;left: 622px;top: 38px;width: 127px;height: 36px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

text:
実際はまだ見てない、
皆はただの見習いよ。
本当のマスコットは
２つ上の上級生で…
style: font-size: 14px;color: #530066;background-color: #E9A6FF;left: 630px;top: 120px;width: 146px;height: 97px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;
